ygData.subject: RE: Question about the Battle Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the board is actually a part of http://www.harpers.net/bard Lots of good info there too (both the site and the board). ... -- John H. Kim
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the board is actually a part of

http://www.harpers.net/bard

Lots of good info there too (both the site and the board).

On Wed, 11 Aug 1999, Chris Kuenster (Entex) wrote:

> http://www.sitepowerup.com/mb/view.asp?BoardID=105011
>

> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Question about the Battle Drum
>

> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> Ok, I'm busted. I'm a newie 11th song Bard...
>
> But in my defense, being a Bard has been *the best* time I've had playing EQ
> to date. I've got a level 24 monk, and he's dull, dull, desperately dull.
>
> Where is the "Songs of Norrath" bulletin board?
>
> Jason A. Farqu´┐¢
